cz.cvut.fel.kinclma1

Class AbstractTones

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cvut.fel.kinclma1.AbstractTones
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InstrumentTones
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bass5Tones, BassTones, Guitar7Tones, GuitarTones, HarmonicaATones, HarmonicaCTones, SoloTones, TestBassTones, TestTones

    public abstract class AbstractTones
extends java.lang.Object
implements InstrumentTones
    Abstract class implementing all methods needed by any InstrumentTones filter class

      Creates tone filter from an array of MusicStringTone string representations

        Parameters:
